original_text: He made interwoven chains and put them on top of the pillars. He also made a hundred pomegranates and attached them to the chains.
korean_text: 성소 같이 사슬을 만들어 그 기둥 머리에 두르고 석류 백 개를 만들어 사슬에 달았으며

sentences.original_text: and put them on top of the pillars
He also made a hundred pomegranates
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 석류 열매 백 개를 만들었다

sentences.original_text: and attached them to the chains
